name: Ordinary Day (Late Night Studios, NekOz, Kimusabe)
name_original: Ordinary Day (Late Night Studios, NekOz, Kimusabe)
description: In this short psychological horror you awaken to your regular routine, however, something is scratching to get out, something buried deep...Something that has always been with you waiting to get out, waiting for the opprtunity granted by the loss of your closest friend.
